Localization.Name: Tarsus
Localization.Description: Founded by a pair of mechanics who were attempting to make an affordable module that would convert a quantum drive into a jump drive, Tarsus has evolved to become one of the main producers of dependable jump drives in the UEE. Over time they also expanded to build their own quantum drives as well.

English.Name: Tarsus
English.Description: Founded by a pair of mechanics who were attempting to make an affordable module that would convert a quantum drive into a jump drive, Tarsus has evolved to become one of the main producers of dependable jump drives in the UEE. Over time they also expanded to build their own quantum drives as well.

Localization.Name: Exodus
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Jump Module
Manufacturer: Tarsus
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Journey across the ‘verse with Tarsus’ Exodus jump module, offering greater reliability to help take your wanderlust to new heights.
